mapper.select: SELECT preference_id AS id, user_id, facility_type AS facilityType, frequency, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM user_preference WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY updated_at DESC

SELECT preference_id AS id, user_id, facility_type AS facilityType, frequency, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM user_preference WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND facility_type = #{facilityType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_preference (user_id, facility_type, frequency, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{facility_type}, #{frequency}, #{created_at}, #{updated_at})
mapper.select: SELECT c.class_id AS id, c.name, c.type, c.instructor, c.time, c.location, c.capacity FROM fitness_class c WHERE c.type IN ( SELECT facility_type FROM user_preference WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) AND c.status = 'ACTIVE' AND c.time > NOW() ORDER BY c.time ASC LIMIT 5
